Text:
quality of the rip = excellent...so Thank you.

As far as the movie goes:

even as a fan of this era of pron, the movie was tiresome.  Ok women, dudes are trolls, horrible dialog/worthless plot, worse than you'd imagine acting.  18 min. orgy scene mildly entertaining.  

This one is really for diehard fans of the era, but much better examples can be had...
